sqlMap.select: select sf1.function_id menuId,sf1.url href,sf1.function_name menuName,sf1.parent_function_id parentMenuId from SYS_FUNCTION sf1 where sf1.function_id in( select distinct(sr.function_id) from SYS_RIGHT sr,SYS_FUNCTION sf where sr.function_id=sf.function_id and sr.sys_person_id=#personId# and sf.parent_function_id=#parentMenuId#)

SELECT DISTINCT(SF.FUNCTION_ID) menuId, SF.FUNCTION_NAME menuName, SF.URL menuHref, SF.SHOWNUM showNum ,SF.DISPLAY_MODE displayMode FROM SYS_FUNCTION SF, SYS_RIGHT SR, SYS_BUSINESS_SYSTEM SBS WHERE SR.SYS_PERSON_ID = #sysPersonId# AND SF.PARENT_FUNCTION_ID = #parentMenuId# AND SBS.BUSINESS_SYSTEM_ID = #businessSystemId# AND SR.FUNCTION_ID = SF.FUNCTION_ID AND SF.BUSINESS_SYSTEM_ID = SBS.BUSINESS_SYSTEM_ID AND SF.SYS_STATUS_ID=1 AND SF.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# ORDER BY SF.SHOWNUM

SELECT DISTINCT(SF.FUNCTION_ID) menuId, SF.FUNCTION_EN_NAME menuName, SF.URL menuHref, SF.SHOWNUM showNum ,SF.DISPLAY_MODE displayMode FROM SYS_FUNCTION SF, SYS_RIGHT SR, SYS_BUSINESS_SYSTEM SBS WHERE SR.SYS_PERSON_ID = #sysPersonId# AND SF.PARENT_FUNCTION_ID = #parentMenuId# AND SBS.BUSINESS_SYSTEM_ID = #businessSystemId# AND SR.FUNCTION_ID = SF.FUNCTION_ID AND SF.BUSINESS_SYSTEM_ID = SBS.BUSINESS_SYSTEM_ID AND SF.SYS_STATUS_ID=1 AND SF.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# ORDER BY SF.SHOWNUM
